examples.example: 我提着一袋水果去看望生病的朋友，给他带去了温暖和关怀。

translate.english: I carried a bag of fruits to visit my sick friend and brought him warmth and care.

examples.example: 我开心地提着一袋礼物去拜访我的老师，表达我对他的尊敬和感激。

translate.english: I happily carried a bag of gifts to visit my teacher to express my respect and gratitude to him.

examples.example: 我买了一袋零食，准备和朋友们一起分享这份快乐。

translate.english: I bought a bag of snacks and am ready to share this happiness with friends.
